parse.title: The Children of Húrin, Op. 48 (Full Score)

wikitext.*:
[[File:Hurin Full Score Artwork.png|thumb|Artwork from the Full Score by permission of Ted Nasmith.]]
Published by Zarathustra Music in 2020, the complete Full Score of [[Paul Corfield Godfrey]]'s ''[[The Children of Húrin, Op. 48 (Opera)]]'' updated to reflect amendments made during the production of Volante Opera Production's Demo Recording of the work.

This is a 388 page A4 sized book with full gloss covers.

This is a complete orchestral score with introduction by the composer and synopsis.

Cover Illustration: [[Ted Nasmith|TED NASMITH]] ©2020 “The Slaying of Glaurung"
[[Category:Music books]]
